name: sweet pool
description: As madness and horror devour his world, can Youji find hope amid the nightmare? Experience a bond deeper and darker than love in this unforgettable visual novel.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB VRAM, PixelShader 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: XAudio2 supported
